artist: Painter: After Nicolas Poussin; Draftsman: Antoine Borel; Engraver: Jean Dambrun
description: river bank with Mercury entrusting infant Bacchus to Ino and the nymphs of Nysa; Mercury is pointing to Jupiter and Hebe in the clouds upper left; lower left nymph Echo mourns over dead body of Narcissus
inscription:
Signature, Title,and Inscriptions

below image in black: Peint par N. Poussin   Dessine par Borel   Grave par Dambrun / LA NAISSANCE DE BACCHUS / De la Galerie de S.A.S. Monseigneur le Duc d\'Orléans | on sheet in pencil: 2-231
title: The Birth of Bacchus
